title: Naturopathy — Avon & West Hartford Acupuncture
description: Naturopathic Doctors are trained primary care providers who diagnose, treat, and manage patients with acute and chronic conditions.
cleaned_text: Our services: Our services are tailored to you. We consult with each patient to customize a treatment plan based on their constitution. We aim to correct the root of the health complaint with therapies including acupuncture and herbal medicine and recommend western medical treatment as needed.
